product_name: Merrell Road Glove Dash 2 Road-Running Shoes - Women's
long_description: Whether your're going for 10 miles or 20, the Merrell Road Glove Dash 2 helps you run naturally, without extra bulk or unnecessary features that keep you from focusing on the road ahead. 0mm heel to ball drop encourages your feet to naturally land on the forefoot instead of the heel. 4mm EVA midsoles provide cushioning without preventing your feet from staying in touch with the ground underneath. Synthetic leather and mesh uppers create tough, flexible and breathable barriers around your feet; external TPU heel slings add support. Mesh lining and Drylex footbed contain AEGIS(R) antimicrobial treatment to help keep odors at bay. Rubber toe bumpers protect your feet from rocky or unpredictable terrain; reflective details promote visibility in low light. Vibram(R) Road Glove nonmarking rubber soles offer excellent grip on the pavement. Merrell Road Glove Dash 2 shoes are machine washable; wash gently in cold water and air dr.
short_description: Whether your're going for 10 miles or 20, the Merrell Road Glove Dash 2 helps you run naturally, without extra bulk or unnecessary features that keep you from focusing on the road ahead.
